definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: So had most of the veteran revolutionaries.
sentences.chinese: 同樣西去的還有大多數老一輩革命家。

sentences.english: There are a lot of young artists and older artists, too, that live in that area
sentences.chinese: 那裏住着很多年輕的藝術家和老一輩的藝術家。

sentences.english: Old-time druggists depended on the prescription and patent medicine trade to sustain their operations.
sentences.chinese: 老一輩的藥師靠處方和專利藥來維持生意。

sentences.english: This year is birthday of Peng Zhen of revolutionist of older generation proletariat 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 今年是老一輩無產階級革命家彭真誕辰100週年。

sentences.english: Your generation is definitely leading the way, and people who are older are beginning to wake up as well.
sentences.chinese: 你的課題是前驅先導，當然老一輩也開始覺醒。

sentences.english: The older generation blows bubbles, and the young-developger generation breaks them.
sentences.chinese: 老一輩製造出來的空洞理論，年輕一輩將它們打破。

sentences.english: Filed Donglai Bank, Qingdao older people do not do not know.
sentences.chinese: 提起東萊銀行，老一輩的青島人沒有不知道的。

sentences.english: But she added that this applies to older generations.
sentences.chinese: 但是她接着說，這些比較符合老一輩。

sentences.english: Now the Chinese younger generation is not as job-oriented as the older generations.
sentences.chinese: 現在中國的年輕一代已不像老一輩那樣以工作爲重心。

sentences.english: "The older generation is more accommodating of the state, " says Mr Azmy.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯麥先生說“老一輩更適應國家現狀“。

sentences.english: The older people remember days of clear-aired yore.
sentences.chinese: 老一輩人還記得昔日晴朗的天空。

sentences.english: It's those of us in the older generation who have to make adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 必須做出調整的是我們這些老一輩人。

sentences.english: Prof. Chen Lesu is one of the earliest scholars who started the study.
sentences.chinese: 陳樂素教授便是最早從事宋史研究的老一輩學者之一。
